main event: A Pan American flight crew reported sighting a mysterious luminous object that appeared to be a high altitude rocket burning out above the atmosphere.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 22 Sep 1959 over the East Coast of Labrador,The object was observed traveling from south to north at an extremely high altitude,The crew did not want to identify themselves for fear of being seen as publicity seekers,The object had a reddish glow with a vertical tail and disappeared to the northeast,The observation lasted for about 1 minute.
sighted object: a mysterious luminous object with a reddish glow and a vertical tail
witness description: crew members of a Pan American flight from New York to Paris
